subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My ITC Instrumental TransCommunication System Configuration

full_text:
Great new website Mike! I sent you an email to the new email address.

Misty


--- On Sun, 9/21/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:

> From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] My ITC Instrumental TransCommunication System Configuration
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Sunday, September 21, 2008, 9:36 AM
> Those of you who know who I am... already know I'm a
> geek when it comes 
> to ways of putting these paranormal detector systems
> together.
> First we had the Spiricom, then Frank's Box (Thanks to
> Frank Sumption), 
> then the Radio Shack Hack 12-469 (Thanks to Sum Duck), then
> I came up 
> with the Radio Shack Hack 12-470 a number of hours after
> Sum Duck's 12-
> 469, then my Mike's Box 12.470 system, and a number of
> other creations.
> Then we had a number of individuals, right here on this EVP
> forum, 
> discover ways of 'hacking' other radios for that
> all important 
> continuous sweep input.  Thanks to ALL of you!
> 
> Now... I've decided to try out a bit of ITC.
> Okay... for those of you interested, I've put out (oh
> no, not another 
> video), yes... another video.
> It can be seen at my website:
> http://www.ufomagazine.net
> or on YouTube at:
> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3S-4e-wxd6U
> 
> Thanks... and have a very paranormal day!
> - Mike Coletta (UFO Geek)
